data.message: Just few weeks back i have tried to capture 360 photo with my phone with the help of Facebook 360 camera feature. But now  I'm not able to see the option of 360 photos may i know the possible reason ??

replies.message: Hey Shah. If you have lost the option to post 360 Photos on Facebook, please report it to us by following these steps: http://bit.ly/2yF1LwY. If you're interested, you can find additional information on 360 Photos here: http://bit.ly/2hjxpsq. -Elizabeth
